com.idevicesinc.sweetblue

Interface BleNodeConfig.ReconnectFilter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BleNodeConfig.DefaultReconnectFilter
    Enclosing class:
    BleNodeConfig

    public static interface BleNodeConfig.ReconnectFilter
    An optional interface you can implement on BleNodeConfig.reconnectFilter to control reconnection behavior.
    See Also:
    BleNodeConfig.reconnectFilter, BleNodeConfig.DefaultReconnectFilter

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  BleNodeConfig.ReconnectFilter.Please
      Return value for onEvent(ReconnectEvent).
      static class  BleNodeConfig.ReconnectFilter.ReconnectEvent
      Struct passed to onEvent(BleNodeConfig.ReconnectFilter.ReconnectEvent) to aid in making a decision.
      static class  BleNodeConfig.ReconnectFilter.Type
      An enum provided through BleNodeConfig.ReconnectFilter.ReconnectEvent.type() that describes what reconnect stage we're at.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BleNodeConfig.ReconnectFilter.Please onEvent(BleNodeConfig.ReconnectFilter.ReconnectEvent e)
      Called for every connection failure while device is BleDeviceState.RECONNECTING_LONG_TERM.

    • Method Detail

      • onEvent

        BleNodeConfig.ReconnectFilter.Please onEvent(BleNodeConfig.ReconnectFilter.ReconnectEvent e)
        Called for every connection failure while device is BleDeviceState.RECONNECTING_LONG_TERM. Use the static methods of BleNodeConfig.ReconnectFilter.Please as return values to stop reconnection (BleNodeConfig.ReconnectFilter.Please.stopRetrying()), try again instantly (BleNodeConfig.ReconnectFilter.Please.retryInstantly()), or after some amount of time BleNodeConfig.ReconnectFilter.Please.retryIn(Interval).
